Messages.Title: Castle Hill, Dudley
Messages.Subject: Metro Extension work
Messages.Description:
What's Happening?

There are lane closures along Castle Hill in Dudley to allow the Metro extension works to take place.

During this work, the bus lane will be out of use.

Plan your journey as there is the possibility of increased traffic in the area.

During this work, no buses will be diverted, but the two bus stops of Castle Hill will be out of use. Passengers should use the Bus Station instead which is a five-minute walk away.

Travel Advice

Allow extra time for your journey.
